fields.description: Will be played when starting to drag.

fields.label: Matching Image
fields.description: An optional image to match against instead of using two cards with the same image.

fields.label: Alternative text for Matching Image
fields.description: Describe what can be seen in the photo. The text is read by text-to-speech tools needed by visually impaired users.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the game behaves.

fields.label: Add button for retrying when the game is over
Maximum number of columns
fields.description: Set the maximum number of columns to be shown. The number of columns can still become smaller than the value set unless you enforce the number of columns.

fields.label: Enforce number of columns
fields.description: The content type will reduce the number of columns if the available space becomes too small. Activate this setting if you want to enforce the maximum number of columns even on a narrow screen knowing that cards may become too small to be used.

fields.label: Feedback text
fields.description: Feedback text, variables available: @score and @total. Example: 'You got @score of @total possible points'

fields.label: Audio not supported message
fields.default: Your browser does not support this audio
